title: How does 5G work, and how much better is it than 4G? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well until now all the network has been brodcasted from one point (i.e. Tower ) but now after 5G it will be worked through chains of small box ( you can imagine as a router but a bigger one) which will be installed in every corber of streets with some distances. Ans now what will happen is insted of broadcasting through whole area each box will target the users and pin point its network directly hence, improveing the network speed. Well its better coz its 5 th gen, ( greater speed )
